content.description: A short right-slanting crack that features a roof at the beginning for added challenge.
content.location:
Located 15 feet right of

Practice Crack #3

.

content.description: A short slanting crack that leans right and provides a quick exercise in jamming.
content.location:
Located 10 feet right of

Practice Crack #2

.

content.description: Start up a short vertical crack that splits into a Y and take the right branch which forms a right-facing corner.
content.location:
Located 100 meters left of

Headstone Crack Left

.

content.description: Start up a short vertical crack that splits into a Y and take the left branch.
content.location:
Located 100 meters left of

Headstone Crack Left

.

content.description: Wander up the steep face through patches of dark brown patina on this short but fun top-rope problem.
content.location:
Located on the rounded buttress above and left of the

Headstone Crack Left

.

content.description: This is the rightmost of two short cracks that can be found on the north aspect of the boulder pile surrounding Headstone Rock.  They are both worthwhile short trad climbs, and are shady on a sunny day.  About the same difficulty as Headstone Crack Left.
content.protection: Light rack, 2 bolt anchor with chains. Descent is a scramble off to the left.
content.location: Leaving Ryan Campground, walk east toward Headstone Rock (which you can't possible miss).  When you reach the base of the formation, walk around to the left (north side) until you see these two obvious short cracks.

content.description: This is the leftmost of two short cracks that can be found on the north aspect of the boulder pile surrounding Headstone Rock.  They are both worthwhile short trad climbs, and are shady on a sunny day.  Both sides of the crack are lined with grippy pinches and edges.  About the same difficulty as Headstone Crack Right.
content.protection: Light rack, 2 bolt anchor with chains. Descent is a scramble off to the left.
content.location: Leaving Ryan Campground, walk east toward Headstone Rock (which you can't possible miss).  When you reach the base of the formation, walk around to the left (north side) until you see these two obvious short cracks.

content.description: Climbs a left-facing flake in a larger left-facing corner and features a short wide section once past the initial flake.
content.location:
Located 10 feet right of

Headstone Crack Right

.
